PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-14522014-12-12AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Agricultural Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Maple Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MAPLE PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) support industry in marketing and selling maple syrup; (2) facilitate the adoption of harmonized North American maple syrup standards; (3) facilitate the traceability of maple products when food safety concerns arise; and (4) prevent the crystallization of maple syrup by incorporating a maximum soluble solid content into the definition of maple syrup.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0297 Publication Date: 2014-12-31
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Maple Products Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the MAPLE PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) support industry in marketing and selling maple syrup; (2) facilitate the adoption of harmonized North American maple syrup standards; (3) facilitate the traceability of maple products when food safety concerns arise; and (4) prevent the crystallization of maple syrup by incorporating a maximum soluble solid content into the definition of maple syrup.
